Text: Request for a meeting with Cordell HullMr Skilling Cordell W Hull Chairman and CEO of InfrastructureWorld and a Director of Bechtel Group Inc will be in Houston on Wednesdayand Thursday Augustrespectively and would like to meet with you at your convenience during that period if your calendar allows Thank you for your consideration and I will contact your office tomorrow to see if this works with your schedule With best regards Jane Pavone InfrastructureWorldcom Oyster Point Blvd Suite S San Francisco CA Tel Fax
